duties_responsibilities.duty: Set goals and develop plans to execute on those goals.
Serve as a true leader that seeks to serve the sales team.
Recognize the irreplaceable value of hard work and the commitment required to achieve financial goals.
Uphold high standards of professionalism, ethics, and become a highly visible member of the community.
Build and manage within a business development role.
Utilize proprietary lead generation and training systems to build their own business.
Meet with clients over the internet utilizing Zoom, Facetime, etc. All leads are provided, no cold calling or prospecting.
Attend industry events, conferences, and trade shows to network with potential clients.
Engage with the lead system and fulfill the insurance needs of customers in their geographic area.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
